title: Mahomes tears ACL as Chiefs' playoff hopes end
content: Patrick Mahomes suffered a torn ACL in the closing minutes of Sunday's loss to the Chargers, an MRI confirmed. "Don't know why this had to happen," he wrote on social media. "And not going to lie, [it] hurts."

title: Source: Pack's Parsons believed to have torn ACL
content: The initial belief is that the Packers' Micah Parsons suffered a torn ACL, a source confirmed to ESPN.

title: McCarthy hits 'Griddy' before TD, irking O'Connell
content: Vikings coach Kevin O'Connell was displeased with J.J. McCarthy's modified "Griddy" touchdown dance, a celebration the QB admitted he had been warned not to do.

title: Rivers: Return was 'blast,' but loss stings most
content: In his stunning return after nearly five full seasons in retirement, Philip Rivers started at quarterback for the Colts and positioned them to win before a late collapse by Indy in an 18-16 loss to the Seahawks on Sunday.

title: Pavia sorry for 'disrespectful' Heisman reaction
content: Vanderbilt quarterback Diego Pavia, the Heisman Trophy runner-up, apologized Sunday for "being disrespectful" in a social media post he made after Indiana's Fernando Mendoza won the award for college football's best player.

title: LeBron seals win after Brooks antics earn ejection
content: After hitting a go-ahead 3-pointer with 12.2 seconds left, Suns forward Dillon Brooks earned his second technical foul for bumping his old nemesis, LeBron James, and was ejected. The Lakers superstar went on to secure the 116-114 win for L.A.

title: Aggies shock unbeaten volleyball No. 1 Huskers
content: The NCAA women's volleyball tournament was rocked Sunday as Texas A&M upset previously unbeaten No. 1 Nebraska, sending the Aggies to the program's first final four. Hours later, Texas was the second top seed ousted on its home court, losing to Wisconsin.

title: Wiggin, coach who lost on 'The Play,' dies at 91
content: Paul Wiggin, the former Stanford and Cleveland Browns star who was on the losing end of "The Play" as the coach of star quarterback John Elway and the Cardinal, died Friday. He was 91.

title: ðŸ˜ˆ Bills roast Patriots in NFL Week 15 trolls
content: NFL teams remained petty in Week 15 with the Buffalo Bills poking fun at the New England Patriots after a huge road win.

title: Henderson and Lawrence paint playoff masterpiece; more winners and losers of Week 15
content: TreVeyon Henderson, Trevor Lawrence and Trey McBride led the way with big Week 15 performances, while Joe Burrow, Quinshon Judkins and Ladd McConkey were among the biggest disappointments.

title: NBA Cup semifinals takeaways: Spurs upset Thunder; Brunson inspires Knicks
content: The top moments, highlights from the NBA Cup semifinals in Las Vegas between the Magic and Knicks, then Spurs and Thunder.

title: John Cena takes his last bow at WWE Saturday Night's Main Event
content: After sending John Cena out on a loss, Gunther has a new 'legend killer' nickname, and young talent shines.

title: A reason (or two) to watch every one of this season's bowl games
content: With first-year success stories, redemption  chances and general silliness, bowl season always delivers.

title: Steelers color rush on 'MNF' tops NFL Week 15 uniforms
content: The NFL uniform scene in Week 15 is off to a strong start with "Thursday Night Football," but the week ends well, too.

title: Untold stories of Detroit Lions QB Jared Goff
content: Goff has a toughness that belies his California cool demeanor. Four stories that explain the Lions QB, from those who know him best.

title: To win title, Arsenal must handle pressure better
content: The Gunners made their clash with Wolves far more grueling than it needed to be, which doesn't bode well for their title aspirations.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United ready to make January move for Semenyo
content: Bournemouth winger Antoine Semenyo is being lined up for a January move to Manchester United. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Thin attendance in Assembly continues in Belagavi session
content: Thin attendance of members in Belagavi goes against the spirit of holding the legislature session in this border city Â to focus on north Karnataka issues

title: Legislature pays rich tributes to veteran legislator and former Karnataka Minister Shamanuru Shivashankarappa
content: Legislators cutting across party affiliations hailed the 94-year-old entrepreneur-turned-politician as ajaathashatru (one without enemies)

title: Schools in Jalandhar hit by bomb threat; evacuation ordered, searches on
content: ACP (North) Sanjay Kumar, who was at KMV School, said, "A threat was received on the school Principal's email that the building would be blown up"

content: Vice-Chancellor Dr. S.V. SureshaÂ stressed UAS-Bâ€™s commitment to driving innovation and noted that KrishiVitta 2025 aims to boost the flow of equity and debt capital into Indiaâ€™s agri and allied sectors

title: Temple withdraws Dileep invite amid backlash, coupon launch of festival postponed
content: The event in connection with the annual festival at the Ernakulam Siva Temple will now be held without any celebrity

title: Ram Vilas Vedanti â€” Ram Janmabhoomi movement leader and former BJP MP â€” dies in Rewa after heart attack
content: Vedanti was the executive president of the Shri Ram Janmabhoomi Trust and had been elected to the Lok Sabha from Pratapgarh and Machhali Shahar in neighbouring Uttar Pradesh earlier

title: 'Vote chori' issue raised by Congress, INDIA bloc has nothing to do with it: Omar Abdullah
content: Omar Abdullah emphasises the independence of political agendas within the Opposition coalition, clarifying that his party will not endorse Congressâ€™s allegations against the BJP regarding electoral misconduct

title: Messi tour: Bengal police summon 6 event managers for quizzing, arrest 5 for vandalism
content: The police are also trying to pinpoint accountability for allowing unauthorised food and beverage sales inside the stadium, the containers of which were later used as missiles by the irate crowd during the rampage

title: Supreme Court protects Shreyas Talpade, Alok Nath from arrest in marketing scam case
content: Courtâ€™s decision comes amid allegations that the actorsâ€™ endorsements of a now-defunct cooperative society misled investors, prompting a multifaceted investigation into their involvement in the alleged financial scam

title: Air pollution crisis: Delhi HC advises lawyers to avail hybrid mode for appearing in court
content: Chief Justice of India Surya Kant also advised members of the Bar and parties-in-person to avail hybrid mode of appearance in matters listed before the Supreme Court

title: Search operation ends in Anjaw truck accident, 20 bodies recovered
content: Despite extremely challenging terrain and weather conditions, rescue teams successfully retrieved 20 bodies from the gorge, while one labourer survived the mishap

title: Outraging womanâ€™s modesty: Kerala police oppose film director, CPI(M) leader Kunju Muhammedâ€™s anticipatory bail
content: The police have moved the court for recording the complainantâ€™s sworn statement in camera before a judicial magistrate under Section 183 of the BNSS

title: Shetty Institute of Technology hosts inter-college coding contest â€˜Code Fusion 2025â€™
content: Students from various institutions, including Visvesvaraya University, Sharnbasva University, and Poojya Doddappa Appa College of Engineering, participated in the event.

title: Enforcement Directorate questions Yes Bank's Rana Kapoor in Reliance Anil Ambani group case
content: The probe is related to the period between 2017-2019 when Yes Bank alleged investments to Reliance Home Finance Ltd (RHFL) instruments and Reliance Commercial Finance Limited (RCFL) instruments

title: Will localise EV components in next few years: Maruti Suzuki
content: Maruti Suzuki India Senior Executive Officer Partho Banerjee announced plans for 1,500 EV-enabled workshops across 1,100 cities and 100,000 charging stations by 2030, targeting growth in a market still dominated by ICE.

title: Supreme Court grants interim bail to journalist Mahesh Langa in money laundering  case
content: The Supreme Court directed the Directorate of Enforcement (ED) to file a report on whether Mahesh Langa has complied with the interim bail conditions

title: Cancellation of Indigo flights is a â€˜grave and publicâ€™ concern: Supreme Court
content: The Bench pointed out that a petition is pending before the Delhi High Court regarding the same matter, and permitted the petitioner to join the proceedings before the High Court

title: Humane Animal Society launches re-vaccination drive in eight regions of Coimbatore
content: Since launching the campaign, more than 3,000 dogs have already been vaccinated. The campaign is expecting to cross 6,000 dogs by December 18, 2025

title: CPI signals that Sabarimala gold theft scandal eclipsed LDFâ€™s governance track record at local body poll hustings
content: Notably, the CPI mouthpiece Janayugam editorial underscored that LDF failed in distancing itself democratically from leaders of social organisations championing schismatic religious and caste identity politics, primarily by demonising minorities

title: Nehru made Kashmir issue controversial, India got extremism, separatism from there: Adityanath
content: Uttar Pradesh Chief Yogi Adityanath said that there was uncertainty about the fate of the princely State of Jammu and Kashmir

title: Four flights cancelled at Hyderabad airport as dense fog in Delhi, North India disrupts air traffic
content: The Ministry of Civil Aviation issued an impact alert for northern India earlier in the day, warning passengers of significant visibility issues at Delhi and other airports in the region

title: Auto driver stabbed to death after argument at Hyderabad auto stand
content: The Tolichowki police booked a case against accused Bilal, and police said efforts are under way to trace and arrest him

title: Elderly woman found strangled to death in Nolambur
content: A 65-year-old man had tried to rob gold jewellery from the elderly woman but as she resisted him, he had strangled her

title: India cannot afford to pollute its way to prosperity: Congress
content: Delhi choked under a thick blanket of smog on December 15, with the Air Quality Index settling at 498, which falls in the higher spectrum of 'severe' category

title: Congress expels Odisha ex-MLA Mohammed Moquim for anti-party acitivities
content: Mr. Moquim has recently written a letter to former Congress President Sonia Gandhi pointing out critical phase the party was passing through and questioned ability of the current leadership in taking party forward

title: 21% voters turnout till noon in Arunachal panchayat, civic polls
content: Altogether, 440 candidates are contesting for 186 zilla parishad seats, while 39 are in the fray for 16 IMC wards and 21 for eight wards of the Pasighat Municipal Council (PMC)

title: Centre to bring new rural employment bill to replace MGNREGA
content: The Viksit Bharat - Guarantee For Rozgar And Ajeevika Mission (Gramin) Bill proposes to increase guaranteed workdays from 100 to 125 but increases financial burden on StatesÂ

title: 2025 ICTP Prize awarded to Titas Chanda, Sthitadhi Roy
content: The laureatesâ€™ work is relevant to problems in keeping quantum devices, like quantum computers, under control and understanding what they do when theyâ€™re not in equilibrium

title: Haryana IPS officer's death: Shatrujeet Kapur relieved from DGP charge
content: O.P. Singh, who was given the additional charge as State police chief during Shatrujeet Kapur's absence, has been appointed as officiating DGP till further orders

title: MGNREGA to be replaced by VBâ€“G Ram G: What it is and how itâ€™s different â€” key FAQs answered
content: The Centre is set to replace MGNREGA with the VBâ€“G RAM G Bill, 2025, guaranteeing 125 days of wage employment and focusing on water security, rural infrastructure, and climate resilience. This revamped law aims to boost the rural economy, benefit farmers and labourers through increased income, predictable work, and digital formalisation, addressing past systemic failures.

title: PM Modi in Jordan: To hold talks with King Abdullah II; what's at stake
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi commenced a three-nation tour in Jordan, marking 75 years of diplomatic ties. He will then visit Ethiopia, a key African Union hub, to bolster bilateral relations and address Parliament. The tour concludes in Oman, aiming to deepen their strategic partnership and economic ties, with engagements including diaspora meetings.

title: Rupee sinks further, hits new all-time low of 90.74 vs dollar
content: The Indian rupee hit a fresh all-time low of 90.74 against the US dollar, pressured by uncertainty over an India-US trade deal and continued foreign fund outflows. Despite positive macro cues, the rupee struggled as importers' strong dollar demand and risk-averse sentiment dominated. Experts see a bullish near-term bias for the USD-INR pair.

title: 'Just living my life': Elon Musk's ex-girlfriend claims he 'blocked' her
content: Grimes revealed Elon Musk blocked her on X, stating her sole focus is co-parenting their three children.  This comes amidst an ongoing custody dispute where Grimes has expressed frustration over legal battles and access to their sons.  Despite their separation, they continue to navigate co-parenting arrangements.

title: Pak national, unemployed: What we know about Bondi Beach shooters Sajid Akram & Naveed
content: Tragedy struck Bondi Beach as a father-son duo unleashed gunfire at a Hanukkah event, claiming at least 15 lives. The attackers, identified as Sajid and Naveed Akram, opened fire from a footbridge. Police neutralised Sajid, while Naveed was apprehended. Investigations are underway, with possible links to extremist groups being explored.

title: Delhiâ€™s toxic air: 82% know someone ill due to pollution - Study
content: A new survey reveals 82% of Delhi-NCR residents know someone suffering serious health issues attributed to long-term air pollution exposure. This comes as Delhi's AQI reached 498, in the 'severe' category, exacerbating a public health crisis and raising concerns about affording medical treatment.

title: Sydney attack: Rabbi who organised 26/11 memorial among victims; survived by wife, 5 children
content: Sydney's Jewish community mourns Rabbi Eli Schlanger, a victim of a recent antisemitic attack. Just days prior, he honored victims of the 2008 Mumbai terror. Schlanger, a dedicated community leader, actively campaigned against rising antisemitism. The attack, Australia's worst in decades, has prompted calls for solidarity from global leaders.

title: â€˜American Iconâ€™ down: 3 decade old tech company bankrupt; China firm takes over
content: iRobot, the maker of Roomba, has filed for bankruptcy and will be acquired by its supplier, Shenzhen PICEA Robotics. This move cancels $264 million in debt, allowing iRobot to continue operations as a private company. Intense competition from Chinese firms and the collapse of an Amazon acquisition deal led to the company's downfall after 35 years.

title: Why UK work visas for Indians are falling: Nursing visas down by 79% & more
content: UK immigration changes introduced in July 2025 are significantly impacting Indian professionals and students, with sharp drops in visa approvals for healthcare, IT, and student routes. Tighter criteria, higher salary thresholds, and reduced post-study work periods are forcing many to reconsider their plans or look to alternative destinations like Canada and Australia.

title: 'Vote chori is Cong issue': Abdullah's distances INDIA bloc from Rahul's choir against EC
content: In a recent statement, Jammu and Kashmir's Chief Minister Omar Abdullah clarified that his party does not align with the Congress-led 'vote chori' initiative, asserting that the INDIA coalition remains uninvolved. He underscored the importance of each political faction crafting its own narrative while urging the Election Commission to maintain its autonomy and impartiality, highlighting concerns raised in Bihar.

title: Chinaâ€™s $1 tn trade surplus! Winning on export front â€” how is Beijing dealing with Trumpâ€™s tariff hit
content: Despite US tariffs, China's trade surplus hit a record $1 trillion, driven by global demand for its goods. Exporters pivoted from the US to Europe, Asia, and Africa. This resilience, fueled by manufacturing strength and weak domestic demand, bolsters Beijing's stance in trade talks, though concerns about sustainability and global trade tensions persist.

title: Nvidia responds to report claiming China's DeepSeek that wiped billions from US stock market in January 2025, is using 'banned' Nvidia chips
content: Nvidia has denied reports that Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is using smuggled Blackwell GPUs, calling the claims "far-fetched." The US has banned these advanced chips from export to China to maintain its AI lead. DeepSeek's previous AI model launch at a lower cost had already rattled US markets and sparked concerns about China's AI progress.

title: Reasons for Messi mess: Neta clansâ€™ selfie rush; pen scratching iconâ€™s hand set off alarm
content: The electrifying atmosphere at Salt Lake Stadium turned sour during Messi's visit, when eager fans found themselves unable to catch a glimpse of their idol. A misguided attempt by a VIP to secure an autograph sparked concerns for safety, forcing an early departure for the soccer legend.

title: Bold warning! 'We will 'trap' Vaibhav Suryavanshi': Malaysia captain
content: Young Vaibhav Suryavanshi's stellar 171 against UAE was followed by a quiet 5 against Pakistan. Malaysia captain Deeaz Patro, inspired by David Warner and with an Odisha connection, plans strategies to dismiss Suryavanshi. Aalif, a Virat Kohli admirer, also looks forward to the challenge.

title: 'Thoughtful analysis': Tharoor shares post comparing his ideas with Rahul; what it said
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor reposted a thread comparing his political approach to Rahul Gandhi's, calling the analysis "fair" and "reflective of a certain perception of the current reality." The thread criticized Gandhi's rural-centric policies as "devastating" and highlighted Tharoor's alignment with his background and audience.

title: Connor McDavidâ€™s wife, Lauren Kyle launches Sports Club Atelier collection
content: Lauren Kyle, wife of NHL star Connor McDavid, is launching a Canada-inspired collection for her brand, Sports Club Atelier, in January. Drawing inspiration from vintage winter advertising and alpine campaigns, the line features red-and-white pieces designed for fans to express patriotic pride fashionably at sporting events and in everyday life.

title: NHL Update: Connor McDavid reacts to Oilers trading Skinner, Kulak
content: The Edmonton Oilers made a significant roster change, trading goalie Stuart Skinner and defenseman Brett Kulak to the Pittsburgh Penguins for Tristan Jarry and Spencer Stastney. While the move addressed goaltending needs, it was acknowledged as a difficult decision by players like Connor McDavid and Head Coach Kris Knoblauch, who praised the departing players' contributions.

title: Where Does Auston Matthews Live? Inside Leafs Starâ€™s Homes and Wealth
content: Auston Matthews' net worth is estimated at $30 million in 2025, driven by his substantial NHL salary and lucrative endorsement deals with major brands like Nike and RBC. Beyond hockey, he has strategically invested in startups and actively supports men's health through philanthropy, showcasing a multi-faceted financial profile.

title: Building a sensible portfolio: How many stocks are enough? Explained
content: Investors often fall into extremes with stock portfolios, either too concentrated or overly diversified. A balanced approach, typically 10-20 stocks, is recommended. Key to success is sensible position sizing, avoiding tiny holdings, and ensuring sector diversification to mitigate risks and enhance overall portfolio performance.

title: Dhurandhar' box office collection day 11: Ranveer Singh starrer crosses Rs 350 crore
content: Aditya Dhar's 'Dhurandhar' is shattering box office records, surpassing expectations with its phenomenal run. The film starring Ranveer Singh and a stellar cast achieved a massive Rs 351.75 crore in just ten days, boasting the biggest second weekend ever. Its incredible word-of-mouth momentum has propelled it past 'Pushpa 2' and hints at a potential Rs 500 crore milestone.

title: IPL Auction: Far from perfect â€” champions RCB look to plug gaps in Abu Dhabi
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru, led by Rajat Patidar, finally clinched their maiden IPL title in 2025, defeating Punjab Kings. With a strong batting lineup and effective bowling, RCB enters the 2026 auction with Rs 16.40 crore and 8 slots to fill, aiming to bolster their bowling depth and middle-order options.

title: Goa club fire: Luthra bros to be deported from Thailand tomorrow; police to take custody at airport
content: Luthra brothers, co-owners of a North Goa nightclub, are being deported from Bangkok to face charges after a fatal fire on December 6, 2025. The blaze, which claimed 25 lives, is suspected to have been caused by electric firecrackers igniting the ceiling. The brothers allegedly operated the venue without proper safety permits.

title: Exclusive | 'Four-Day Tests need better over ratesâ€™ - Former Australia player Tom Moody
content: Tom Moody, Desert Vipers Director of Cricket, believes the ILT20â€™s biggest success lies in accelerating UAE's domestic talent. He stressed that smart auctions are about needs, not wants, highlighted the evolution of coaching with changing players, and urged cricketâ€™s governing bodies to protect Test cricket amid franchise growth â€” even if that means exploring four-day Tests with stricter over-rate discipline.

title: Deadly pile-up on Delhi-Mumbai Expressway: Multiple vehicles collide due to dense fog; 4 dead
content: Dense fog on the Delhi-Mumbai Expressway led to multiple accidents on Monday morning, resulting in at least four fatalities and several injuries. A major pile-up involving over 15 vehicles near Raniyala Patakpur village claimed two lives, including a CISF inspector. Another collision in Faridabad also resulted in two deaths.

title: Drums, conch shells and saffron flags: Pankaj Chaudhary takes UP BJP charge; is 7-time MP
content: Pankaj Chaudhary, a seven-time MP, was formally appointed as the new Uttar Pradesh BJP chief in Lucknow amidst a grand 'Sangathan Parva' event. Union Minister Piyush Goyal announced the decision, highlighting the party's focus on social inclusivity with diverse representation on the dais. The ceremony saw massive worker turnout, underscoring Chaudhary's organizational strength.

title: Bondi beach attack: New video captures tense police standoff, moment shooter was neutralised
content: Tragedy struck Bondi Beach as two gunmen opened fire during a Hanukkah celebration, killing at least 15 people.  Bystanders and police bravely confronted the attackers, with one civilian disarming a gunman. Authorities are investigating the source of the weapons and potential accomplices, while the Prime Minister condemned the act as 'evil anti-Semitism'.

title: RBI repo rate cut: Prepay your home loan now to save interest outgo; hereâ€™s how
content: RBI's repo rate cuts are making home loans cheaper, but borrowers should focus on total interest paid. Prepaying high-cost, long-term loans offers a guaranteed, risk-free return higher than most fixed income investments post-tax. Early repayment significantly reduces total interest outgo and loan tenure, boosting long-term financial health.

title: 'Women only for sleeping with husbands': Kerala CPM leaderâ€™s victory speech sparks row
content: A CPM regional leader in Malappuram has sparked controversy with a misogynistic victory speech. Saed Ali Majeed, who won a panchayat seat, stated that women brought through marriage are not for political gain, implying their role is solely domestic. He further suggested that those unable to handle political criticism should remain housewives.

title: â€˜Rahul ji himself says daro mattâ€¦â€™: Ex-MLA Moquimâ€™s 1st reaction after Congress expulsion
content: Former Congress MLA Mohammed Moquim was expelled from the party for "anti-party" activities after he wrote to Sonia Gandhi expressing dissatisfaction with the leadership and recent electoral losses. Moquim defended his actions, stating he offered suggestions for reform as a true Congress worker.

title: MLB: Atlanta Braves looking to acquire $325 million Texas Rangers superstar
content: Atlanta Braves are reportedly exploring a blockbuster trade for Texas Rangers star Corey Seager, a move that could significantly alter the NL playoff landscape. Despite Seager's hefty contract and a no-trade clause, the Braves see him as a crucial solution for their shortstop woes. This potential deal offers Atlanta elite offense and Texas a chance to rebuild their farm system.

title: Rupee tumbles down to all time low of 90.75 against US dollar
content: The Indian Rupee hit an all-time low of 90.56 against the US dollar, marking its second consecutive week of record declines. This depreciation is attributed to a lack of a US trade deal, weak capital inflows, and a widening trade deficit.

title: Pune: How minor brush left HR exec with a bloodied eye; 3 men chase couple's car
content: A minor road altercation on the Katrajâ€“Dehu Road bypass escalated into a brutal attack, leaving a 28-year-old Mumbai woman with a grievous eye injury. Three men on a two-wheeler allegedly chased and pelted stones at her car after an alleged minor foot injury during an overtaking maneuver.

title: Why from Bihar & why now? BJP names Nitin Nabin working president; party signals generational shift
content: Nitin Nabin, a 45-year-old Bihar minister, has been appointed BJP's working president, positioning him to become the youngest national president. His selection, seen as a strategic move by Prime Minister Modi and Amit Shah, signals a generational shift within the party. Nabin's five-term MLA experience and organizational skills have been highlighted as key factors in his rapid ascent.

title: RRB NTPC Graduate CBT-2 Result 2025 released for 8113 posts, check direct link here
content: RRB NTPC Result 2025: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has declared the RRB NTPC Graduate CBT-2 Result 2025 for 8113 graduate-level posts. Candidates can check their selection status using enrollment number, registration number, or date of birth via indianrailways.gov.in or rrbbilaspur.gov.in. The examination was held on October 13, 2025. Eligible candidates meeting the age criteria of 18-36 years will proceed to the next recruitment stage. Download the result and verify your status to stay updated on further recruitment rounds.

title: 'Trust me': Abhishek Sharma's strong message for Shubman Gill critics
content: Abhishek Sharma backs his childhood friend Shubman Gill to overcome a T20I lean patch, expressing strong confidence in his ability to deliver match-winning performances, including at the upcoming T20 World Cup. Despite Gill's recent struggles, Sharma highlighted their long-standing partnership and his belief in Gill's potential to shine under various conditions.

title: LeBron James erupts in heated Lakers clash after grabbing referee during rivalry game
content: LeBron James lost his cool against Dillon Brooks during a Lakers-Suns game. The incident saw James confront Brooks and a referee. Despite the meltdown, James played a crucial role in the Lakers' narrow victory. The rivalry between the players was evident throughout the match. James' reaction has become a significant talking point of the NBA season.

title: PM Modi begins three-nation tour to Jordan, Ethiopia and Oman; what's on agenda
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi commenced a significant three-nation tour to Jordan, Ethiopia, and Oman, countries with deep historical and contemporary ties to India. The visits, spanning December 15-18, aim to bolster bilateral relations, commemorate diplomatic milestones, and explore avenues for enhanced cooperation across various sectors, including trade and defense.

title: PSL vs IPL again: Marchâ€“May window confirmed; new teams' auction on Jan 8
content: The Pakistan Super League (PSL) will again overlap with the Indian Premier League (IPL) next year, running from March 26 to May 3. This scheduling necessitates adjustments to Pakistan's international commitments, including a proposed tour of Bangladesh. The shift from its traditional February-March window is due to the ICC T20 World Cup.

title: 5 jobs in India that are most at risk from AI
content: AI is already transforming jobs in India. Repetitive and rule-based tasks are most vulnerable as AI offers faster, cheaper alternatives. While job transformation is expected over outright loss, reskilling is crucial for workers to remain relevant in this evolving landscape.

title: Rob Reiner, wife found dead at Los Angeles home; son under suspicion â€” what we know
content: Actor and director Rob Reiner and his wife, Michele Singer, were found dead in their Brentwood home on Sunday afternoon, reportedly victims of a stabbing. The Los Angeles Police Department's Robbery Homicide Division is investigating the incident, with no further details released regarding motive or circumstances.

title: Stocks to buy: What's the outlook for Nifty for this week? Check list of top picks
content: Stock market recommendations: SBI Securities' Sudeep Shah highlights BHEL and Ashok Leyland as top stock picks. Nifty shows resilience, consolidating near all-time highs, with support at 25,700. Bank Nifty, however, lags, trading sideways.

title: Bondi Beach Shooting Live Updates:  Shooter Was On Cops Radar For 6 Years
content: Australia Bondi Beach Shooting News LIVE Updates: At least 16 people, including a shooter, were killed, and as many as 42 others were hospitalised after 50-year-old Sajid Akram and his 24-year-old son Naveed Akram opened fire on a crowd in Sydney.

title: Ex Yes Bank CEO Rana Kapoor Questioned in Anil Ambani Case Over Quid Pro Quo Deals
content: Former Yes Bank CEO Rana Kapoor appeared before investigators at the Enforcement Directorate's headquarters on Monday in connection with the ongoing probe into alleged financial irregularities involving industrialist Anil Ambani.

title: Bondi Beach Terror Attack Kills Rabbi Who Commemorated 26/11 Mumbai Victims
content: A rabbi, who recently helped organise a memorial for the Chabad emissaries killed in the 2008 Mumbai attacks, was among the 15 victims of an antisemitic terror attack at Bondi Beach in Sydney, Australia.

title: "Nothing To Do...": Omar Abdullah Draws INDIA-Congress Line On 'Vote Chori'
content: The INDIA opposition bloc has nothing to do with the Congress's 'vote chori' campaign, Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister and National Conference leader Omar Abdullah has said.

title: Opinion: Opinion | India's Exclusion From US' Pax Silica Club Isn't A Snub - But It Matters
content: India is not part of the initial grouping. Some see this as a snub. Others say it doesn't matter. Both reactions miss the point. The issue is not optics. It's whether India is moving fast enough to be treated as a partner rather than a customer.

title: Man Kills Accused Who Murdered His Brother 10 Years Ago In Bengal
content: Alam Sheikh's elder brother, Nabi Sheikh -- also a local leader of the Trinamool Congress -- said the family had apprehensions after Panna Sheikh returned to the village.

title: Video: Hayabusa Crashes After Cab Changes Lane Near Gurugram's Ambience Mall
content: The collision was so strong that he was thrown off the Hayabusa and rolled about 100 feet away from the car, which came to a halt after the crash.

title: "I Could Not Sleep": Man Targeted After Same Name Mix-Up In Bondi Beach Attack
content: A Sydney man said he had received death threats and was "terrified" to leave his home Monday after his photo was widely shared online as the gunman responsible for the Bondi Beach shooting.

title: Why Nitin Nabin Was Not Named BJP Chief. Decoding 'Working President' Plan
content: Nitin Nabin, the BJP's new working president, is only the second person in the party's history to occupy the post. The first is Jagat Prakash Nadda, the incumbent party chief.

title: Opinion: Opinion | A City Without Water Is A Harbinger Of A Thirsty Planet
content: In Mesopotamia, Egypt and the Indus valley, the first urban settlements were built around irrigated farmland. Flooded terrace fields for rice, corn and quinoa accompanied the spread of civilization in East Asia and the Americas.

title: 60 Years Ago, The CIA Lost A Nuclear Device In The Himalayas. It's Still There
content: In 1965, American and Indian climbers secretly hauled a plutonium-powered generator to the Himalayas.

title: Man Detained Over Brown University Shooting To Be Released, Manhunt Resumes
content: A person detained over the shooting that killed two students at Brown University was to be released, US officials said on Sunday, adding the manhunt had resumed for a suspect.

title: "Nobody Saw Her In Over 2 Years, She Could Be Dead": Aung San Suu Kyi's Son
content: Kim Aris said he has not heard from his 80-year-old mother in years, and has received only sporadic, secondhand details about her heart, bone and gum problems since a 2021 military coup that deposed her government.

title: China To Cover All Childbirth Medical Expenses By 2026 To Boost Birth Rates
content: China will cover all out-of-pocket expenses related to childbirth next year, said the country's national healthcare security administration, as authorities try to incentivise more young couples to have children.

title: 16-Year-Old Boy Killed In Classroom Knife Attack At Pune Coaching Centre
content: A 16-year-old boy was killed after a classmate allegedly attacked him with a knife inside a classroom at a coaching centre in Pune district on Monday, police said.

title: Ukraine's Zelensky Hints US Guarantees May Stand in Place Of NATO Bid
content: President Volodymyr Zelensky signaled that Ukraine could accept security guarantees from the US and Europe as a way to prevent future Russian aggression, and substitute for its long-term goal of joining NATO.

title: India's Strong Objection To Bangladesh's Change Over Pre-Election Shooting
content: Days after the attack on an anti-Sheikh Hasina radical leader in Bangladesh, the Muhammad Yunus administration in Dhaka has sought India's help to arrest and hand over the shooters.

title: Centre To Replace MGNREGA With G Ram G, Congress Asks "Problem With Bapu?"
content: Setting the stage for a political face-off during the ongoing Winter Session of Parliament, the Centre has introduced a Bill that will replace the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee scheme (MGNREGA)

title: Hyderabad MBBS Student Run Over By Speeding Car While Crossing Road
content: A medical student was killed and her father was injured when they were hit by a car while crossing the road in Hyderabad on Monday.

title: What Is Hanukkah, Festival People Were Celebrating At Sydney Beach Before Tragedy

title: AAI's Mumbai radar to be relocated, will free land for affordable housing: Rammohan Naidu

content: The National Investigation Agency will present a charge sheet before a NIA special court in Jammu on December 15, officials said

content: He accuses the right wing of spreading lies and regressive ideas disguised as honey-coated pills to deceive the people. He says the ideology of the DMK is an antidote to politics of the BJP

title: Shamanur: Senior-most MLA, Lingayat leader, industrialist and more
content: Senior-most incumbent MLA in India and a Lingayat strongman of the Congress, 94-year-old Shamanur Shivashankarappa, who passed away on Sunday, will be remembered not just for the empire he built as an industrialist and educationist, but also for his politics and the work he did as president of the All India Veerashaiva Lingayat Mahasabha
